summary: Two snake spirits become human and learn about love and suffering. A monk discovers his own weaknesses and finds that morality is not as simple as he had thought.
cast: Maggie Cheung|Joey Wang|Wenzhuo Zhao|Hsing-Kuo Wu|Ma Cheng-miu|Feng Tien|Tung-Mui Chan|Kong Lau|Shun Lau|Nagma
title: Ching se
